Override.loadingscreentip: Europan caves are full of resources, including ceramite, adamantium and gold.
The most powerful weapons can only be purchased. You can't find them on wrecks or abandoned outposts.
Be careful when exploring alien ruins. Especially if you see a green lightsource moving inside.
You can pray on a special altar to the Omnissiah to acquire his blessing for faster repair speeds.
The Emperor protects!
Astartes armour provides almost absolute invulnerability against the beasts of the Europa, and can withstand pressure up to 12000 meters.
Chaos outposts are colonies that were taken by the heretics. If you want - you can trade with them, but do so at your own risk.
You can corrupt weapons and armour at chaos altars to infuse these items with the powers of the warp.
"The imperial guard is made to fight and die for the Emperor."
Magos priests are the chief techpriests in the crew, and have access to advanced technologies. They can maintain the submarine and kill enemies of the Omnissiah with high efficiency.
Engineseers are of lower rank than magos. Their task is maintaining ship and assisting in expeditions.
Mechanicus axe is a universal tool for work with mechanical and electrical systems. It can also serve as a weapon when in a pinch.
Lasgun power cells can be charged in charging dock or submarine batteries.
Autogun is a simple but deadly weapon.
Necrons are an ancient xenos race that were born 60 million years ago. They have many tomb worlds scattered across the galaxy, and one could be on Europa.

Adeptus mechanicus is a part of humanity that is disillusioned with the fragility of man and abandon their flesh in favour of mechanical simulacras. They are scientists and craftsmen who can make perfect machines, built to destroy the enemies of the Machine god.
The Imperial Guard is the hammer of the Imperium as well as he foundation it rests upon. Without The Guard, the Imperium will fall.
Space marines are genetically modified soldeirs. Their abilities are incomprehensible for the standard man. If The Guard is a hammer of the Emperor, then space marines are His sword.
Powercells for submarine lascannons can be charged in a Cannon Charging Station that can be found on the outposts.
Power armour is a relic that can not be found. You can either craft it or buy it.
Astartes weapons are much more powerful than weapons of the mortals. If you use it without power armour you will take serious damage and possibly death.
Death corps of Krieg are an army of artificially created humans. They are fanatics that seek death for the Emperor above all else.
Krieg weapons are more powerful than standard cadian models but have lower ammo capacity and lower firing rate.
Space marine armour can protect you from poisons, but against a melta or lascannon headshot it will be useless.
Many vessels of the Europa are equipped with lascannons. Try to avoid its shots at all costs.
Planet Europa is located in segmentum Obscurus and has the same name as one of the Jupiter moons.
The Europa Coalition is an official representation of the Imperium on the planet
Hellgun is a good weapon against small beasts and enemy boarding teams because it is stationary version of the hot-shot lasgun
Lascannon is a perfect weapons against armored targets. It is with same efficiency penetrates as submarine hull, as shells of bigger beasts
Corrupted weapons enhanced with powers of the warp and because of that these weapons are more powerful than regular. But usage of corrupted weapons leads to madness.
You can rid from chaos corruption by paying the specialist on the outpost, by repention or if you die in shame...
When you are fallowing the way of the dark gods you can get something that wasn't described...

Cadaveric parasites are one of the primordial diseases in Europe. Grandpa Nurgle worked with them and they became much more aggressive... So much so that they can even hit the body of a space marine, turning him into a filthy abomination - the husk marine.
Khorne is the god of endless war and bloodshed. His servants are blood-crazed berserkers, deadly and unstoppable. Khorne despises ranged combat and sorcery, so his servants use only melee weapons.

Nurgle is the god of disease, death and, in a sense, rebirth. Nurgle bestows his servants with the best diseases so that they carry death and decay across the galaxy. Nurgle appreciates the perseverance of the victims of his illnesses because he is exceptionally kind. Nurgle's servant can be easily distinguished by his rusty armor and bloated carcass from diseases and poisons.

Tzinch is the patron of sorcerers and those who seek for change. He can be called the most chaotic of the great Four because he does not have a specific goal because it contradicts his nature. The servants of the Tzeentch rarely act openly, preferring setups, witchcraft and other manipulations to achieve their goals.

Slaanesh, or the Dark Prince, is the god of excess and intemperance, born of the hedonism of the Eldar race. This dark god strives to achieve absolute pleasure. His servants may look like richly dressed people from the nobility, or like warriors beaten by life, but it does not matter, because every slaaneshit strives to know satisfaction in his own way. The warriors of this god are very graceful in battle, as well as they are not taken by any drugs, because over the millennia of hedonism they have simply ceased to cause any sensations.

The Chaos Space Marines are legionaries who fell ten thousand years ago and followed their primarch fathers. The treacherous Horus, the Emperor's beloved son, betrayed his father and turned to the Dark Gods. Horus fell during the siege of Terra, and the remnants of the traitorous forces moved to the Eye of Terror-a huge warp storm, where the remaining traitor primarchs received their demonic forms, and the legions their worlds, from where they have been raiding the Imperium for thousands of years.

Creating Astartes genetic material requires an experienced biologis adept and a lot of expensive resources. It is possible to create a gene only on a special fabricator, which is located in the biologis department at the forge outposts.

Space Marines are not the best opponents for novice cappers. If you don't have a couple of your space Marines or a whole arsenal of good weapons at hand, then it's better to bypass the battles against the Astartes.
The genetic material of the Astartes can only be used with the help of a black carapace.
Template books allow you to study the schemes specified in them, which makes it possible to create items from a certain category without having the appropriate class.

Tyranids are xenos who have came from the depths of space. Their only purpose is to devour to satisfy the endless hunger. Tyranids are extremely tenacious and very adaptable creatures. They are guided by the hive mind, which extends its will to all representatives of this race. The will of the hive mind is transmitted from the big tyranids to the smaller ones. If this connection is interrupted, the tyranids become dangerous, but still simple animals.

Genestealers are one of the most dangerous creations of the Tyranid hive mind because they have the ability to infiltrate human society and create cults that can prepare the world for the arrival of the hive fleet for the feast.

Разум улья неприрывно разрабатывает новые вариации своих тварей и не брезгует ассимиляцией местной фауны в своих целях. Так появились гибриды-создания тиранидов, основанные на геноме локальной фауны Европы.

The species known as Lutus Raptor tiranicus, or a mud raptor hybrid, is a dangerous creature that has enhanced armor compared to the original, sharper fangs and improved musculature. This creature can survive even a small burst from a bolter.

Khorne's berserkers are mad warriors who have succumbed to the call of their god. They exist only for the sake of committing carnage on a larger and larger scale in order to appease Khorne and at least for a minute stop hearing his roar in therir heads.

Legio Skitarii is a military unit of the Adeptus Mechanicus, which consists of augmented people who are not tech-priests. They are expendable for the magos dominus, who do not care about the safety of his warriors, because there will always be enough candidates for augmentation. There are many specialized units of skitarii. For example, the ranger skitarii are professionals in conducting combat on medium and long-range disstances, or the vanguard skitarii , who bring death to the enemies of the Omnissiah with the help of radium weapons. They are the best assault units.
In the vastness of Europa, you can find many truly unique items. Each of them is extremely expensive and has some unique properties.
To effectively deal with pain, use painkillers, opium, morphine, fentanyl, med kits. It is also recommended to rest for a while in a medical bed after treatment.
The pain is caused by injuries. The more injuries you have, the faster the pain will accumulate.

Dark Mechanicus can be found in abandoned forges. They do not hesitate to use warp and xenotech in their technologies, so they are often armed and equipped better than loyal colleagues. This applies not only to weapons and armor, but also to augmetics.
Only the most reckless gangs of cultists and renegades populate the abandoned forges and mechanicus outposts. So if you meet them, then be prepared for fierce resistance.
As basic heretic gear counts autogun, corrupted lasgun, laspistol, longlas, flak armor and it's champion version.
Override.Entitydescription.lpgmagazine: The standard power cell for the laspistol.
Override.Entitydescription.laspistol: A personal weapon that is easy to use and maintain.
Override.Entitydescription.lgmagazine: The standard power cell for the lasgun.
Override.Entitydescription.lasgun: The most common model of a lasgun. Easy to use and maintain, and can easily take down a human.
Override.Entitydescription.llgmagazine: The standard power cell for the longlas.
Override.Entitydescription.llg: A more powerful version of the lasgun, effective even at long-range.
Override.Entitydescription.hsmagazine: The standard power cell for the hellgun.
Override.Entitydescription: A rare, more powerful version of the lasgun.
Override.Entitydescription.chsword: A simple but powerful melee weapon. It is required to change the chain after regular use.
Override.Entitydescription.psword: This rare and powerful weapon exudes a hazy field of bluish energy that wraps around its atomically honed blade.
Override.Entitydescription.agmagazine: The standard ammunition for the autogun.
Override.Entitydescription.ag: A simplistic weapon that fires solid-slug rounds at the intended target in rapid succession. Cheap, rugged, reliable.
Override.Entitydescription.pltank: The standard plasma tank for use in plasma pistols and plasmaguns.
Override.Entitydescription.plaspistol: A rare and powerful personal weapon.
Override.Entitydescription.pg: It has the same killing power as a pistol, but boasts a higher rate of fire (Pray to the Omnissiah that it does not explode in your hands).
Override.Entitydescription.bgmag: The standard ammunition for the boltgun and bolt pistol.
Override.Entitydescription.bpistol: A pistol that fires explosive bolts. It has extreme destructive power and can easily break through the hull of ships.
Override.Entitydescription.bg: An extremely powerful weapon that shoots explosive bolts, which has a higher rate of fire compared to its pistol counterpart.
Override.Entitydescription.chlasgun: This weapon is decorated with unholy symbols and does not look very reassuring.
Override.Entitydescription.chlgmagazine: This energy cell radiates a very strange aura...
Override.Entitydescription.chlpgmagazine: This energy cell radiates a very strange aura...
Override.Entitydescription.chlaspistol: This weapon is decorated with unholy symbols and does not look very reassuring.
Override.Entitydescription: A good weapon to break through the ship's hull.
Override.Entitydescription.flaktorso: Standard armor of the imperial guardsman.
Override.Entitydescription.flakhelmet1: Standard helmet of the imperial guardsman.
Override.entitydescription.aashotgunshell: Special ammunition with higher lethal power. It is specially designed for adeptus arbites.
Override.Entitydescription.aashotgun: A weighted shotgun using special ammunition. Ideal for suppressing riots.
Override.Entitydescription.kglascarbine: Semi-automatic lascarabine with high lethal power, but low rate of fire.
Override.Entitydescription.kglasgun: The Lucian pattern of lasguns. More powerful, but less capacious.
Override.Entitydescription.phsmagazine: Magazine full of white phosphorus balls.
Override.Entitydescription.phs: A personal weapon that shoots red-hot balls of white phosphor.
Override.Entitydescription.macrostub: Personal weapons of the low rank techpriests. It is an advanced version of the stub pistol.
Override.Entitydescription.arcmagazine: Battery for arc rifle and pistol.
Override.Entitydescription.arcrifle: An advanced weapon capable of knocking out a life-giving spark with its shots, not only from the flesh of the one who was hit by it's shots, but also from machines nearby.
Override.Entitydescription.mechuniform5: ...Obey your Master... Your life burns faster... Obey your Master... Master...
Override.Entitydescription.mechuniform5.2: ...Obey your Master... Your life burns faster... Obey your Master... Master...
Override.Entitydescription.mechuniform6: Uniform of techpriests from this planet.
Override.Entitydescription.t2mechuniform5: ...Obey your Master... Your life burns faster... Obey your Master... Master...
Override.Entitydescription.t2mechuniform5.2: ...Obey your Master... Your life burns faster... Obey your Master... Master...
Override.Entitydescription.t2mechuniform6: Uniform of techpriests from this planet.
Override.Entitydescription.t3mechuniform5: ...Obey your Master... Your life burns faster... Obey your Master... Master...
Override.Entitydescription.t3mechuniform5.2: ...Obey your Master... Your life burns faster... Obey your Master... Master...
Override.Entitydescription.t3mechuniform6: Uniform of techpriests from this planet.
Override.Entitydescription.dominusuniform: The mantle of a high-ranking magos, called the dominus. It has a lot of built-in subsystems, and also has not bad protection for what looks like only a robe.
Override.Entitydescription.exploratoruniform: The mantle of a high-ranking magos, called an explorator. It does not have as good protection as the dominus, but its subsystems will allow you to explore Europa better.
Override.Entitydescription.radmagazine: Ammunition for rad pistol and carbine.
Override.Entitydescription.rp: Personal radiation weapons. It's shots cause monstrous wounds, and the contents of it's bullets will kill the enemy even if he can survive a skirmish with the owner of the weapon.
Override.Entitydescription.rc: Carbine that shoots radium bullets. It's shots cause monstrous wounds, and the contents of it's bullets will kill the enemy even if he can survive a skirmish with the owner of the weapon.
Override.Entitydescription.chpltank: An unnatural glow and an aura of madness emanates from this object.
Override.Entitydescription.chplaspistol: This object is covered with various growths and apparently has some kind of conditional self-awareness.
Override.Entitydescription.chpg: This weapon is decorated with unholy symbols and has a strange aura around it.
Override.Entitydescription.amaxe: The axe that every member of the Mechanicus cult is equipped with. Has enough power to stop a human. Used in many rituals of Adeptus Mechanicus.
Override.Entitydescription.radjez: A long-barreled weapon that shoots radium bullets. It has increased accuracy and lethal force in comparison with conventional carbines.
Override.Entitydescription.ig40mmgrenade: Standard 40 mm grenade. Equally well penetrates the hulls of ships and destroys the enemies of humanity.
Override.Entitydescription.plasmagrenade: powerful explosive that can melt even power armor.
Override.Entitydescription.iggrenadelauncher: Standard six-shot grenade launcher used by Astra Militarum.
Override.Entitydescription.ampltank: Specialised plasma tank for Ryza pattern plasmagun.
Override.Entitydescription.ampg: Ryza pattern plasmagun. Don't explode in hands.
Override.Entitydescription.tasergoad: An advanced energy weapon used exclusively by Adeptus Mechanicus Skitarii.
Override.Entitydescription.arcmaul: A melee weapon capable of knocking out a life-giving spark from the enemy with its blows.
Override.Entitydescription.tsblade: A fast blade capable of piercing almost any armor.
Override.Entitydescription.tsrazor: A fast dagger capable of piercing almost any armor.
Override.Entitydescription.flakhelmet2: A standard Imperial Guardsman helmet equipped with a respirator.
Override.Entitydescription.sergcap: Many sergeants prefer to wear a lighter cap than a helmet.
Override.Entitydescription.comcap: Officio prefectus many Guardsmen are afraid like it's a fire. Along with the uniform, the black cap is the visiting card of any commissar.
Override.Entityname.ihmk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (Iron hands)
Override.Entityname.wsmk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (White scars)
Override.Entityname.swmk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (Space wolves)
Override.Entityname.bamk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (Blood angels)
Override.Entityname.rgmk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (Raven guard)
Override.Entityname.ifmk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (Imperial fists)
Override.Entityname.brmk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (Blood ravens)
Override.Entityname.damk7helmet: Power Armor MK VII helmet (Dark angels)
Override.Entitydescription.swmk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.rgmk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.ifmk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.smk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.wsmk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.ihmk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.ummk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.brmk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds. by Dr. Mors?
Override.Entitydescription.bamk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.lamk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.damk7: Created at the end of the Horus heresy MK VII helps Emperor's angels of death in their hard deeds.
Override.Entitydescription.flakarmor_hev: Heavier Imperial Guard armor. Provides more complete armor with a higher level of protection.
Override.Entitydescription.flakarmor_hev_med: Heavier Imperial Guard armor. Provides more complete armor with a higher level of protection.
Override.Entitydescription.flakarmor_med: Same armor with regular light flak armor but with red cross on it's shoulder pad. Field medics usually wearing this armor.
Override.Entitydescription.abg: The most common bolter model among space marines. It has exceptional killing power and rate of fire, as well as recoil, which is capable of at least breaking the hands of a mortal.
Override.Entitydescription.abpistol: Personal bolt weapon of the space marine. It has exceptional killing power and rate of fire, as well as recoil, which is capable of at least breaking the hands of a mortal.
Override.Entitydescription.chabg: Due to the ritual desecration and the insertion into the demon, weapon somehow surpasses its non-cursed counterpart in the damage inflicted.
Override.Entitydescription.chabpistol: Due to the ritual desecration and the insertion into the demon, weapon somehow surpasses its non-cursed counterpart in the damage inflicted.
Override.Entitydescription.skillbookuniversallaws: Collection of the basic laws of the cult mechanicus.
Override.Entitydescription.smplaspistol: Personal weapon that shoots searing plasma. Allows you to incinerate most opponents with a single shot, but often explodes.
Override.Entitydescription.smpg: Rifle that shoots searing plasma. Allows you to incinerate most opponents with a single hit, but often explodes.
Override.Entitydescription.chsmpltank: Ammo for heretic astartes plasma weapons.
Override.Entitydescription.chsmplaspistol: This desecrated weapon exudes an aura of madness around itself, and its bearer can hear the whispers of the creature imprisoned in it.
Override.Entitydescription.chsmpg: This desecrated weapon exudes an aura of madness around itself, and its bearer can hear the whispers of the creature imprisoned in it.
Override.Entitydescription.smmr: Armor-piercing anti-tank gun. It has a low rate of fire, but is excellent for destroying the skin of ships.
Override.Entitydescription.chsmmr: Armor-piercing anti-tank gun. It has a low rate of fire, but is excellent for destroying the skin of ships but in this case also improved by warp influence.
Override.Entitydescription.chamaxe: This axe is the mark of any heretek who rejected the dogmas of the Mechanicus cult and decided to devote his life to real knowledge.
Override.Entitydescription.necronbatterycell: Based on unknown technology this battery can store amount of energy more than 2 fulgurium batteries.
Override.Entitydescription.sobarmor: Armor of the novices of Adepta Sororitas.
Override.Entitydescription.medkit: Medkit assembled for field use, containing painkillers, broad-spectrum antibiotics, desinfectant, and biogel to treat a wide variety of injuries. Treats damage, burns, bleeding, and pain, with a minor amount of bloodloss restored.
Override.Entitydescription.gypsumbandage: A kit of bandage and medical gypsum. In case of a fracture, it is possible to use it to create a splint to immobilize the limb.
Override.Entitydescription.gypsumbandageadvanced: This kit is also equipped with biogel that can make treatment faster.
Override.Entitydescription.antibioticgel: Advanced version of biogel. Used to treat infected wounds.
Override.Entitydescription.immunopreservant: Usage of these pills will improve your immunity.
Override.Entitydescription.antibioticst2: Semi-synthetic antibiotics that help to cure infection faster.
Override.afflictiondescription.warpcorrupt: The patient is constantly mumbling something about some Dark gods and greatness of chaos... What could this mean..?
Override.Afflictiondescription.phosphorimpact: The patient's skin is covered in burns caused by white phosphorus.
Override.Afflictioncauseofdeathdescription.phopho: Died from pain shock caused by exposure to phosphorus.
Override.Afflictionselfcauseofdeathdescription.ph: You died from pain shock caused by exposure to phosphorus.
Override.Afflictiondescription.omnibless: Your faith in the Omnissiah has been rewarded, granting you increased repair speed, attack damage, skill gain speed, structure repair speed, and move speed.
Override.Afflictiondescription.sergeantinspire: The wise words of your sergeant inspired you to deeds in the Emperor's name.
Override.afflictiondescription.emperorprotects: Somehow the wounds of the patient are slowly healing by themselves...
Override.afflictiondescription.meltadamage: The patient's flesh has melted where the bullet struck.
Override.afflictiondescription.astartesgeneum: The patient has been transformed into an unstoppable angel of death.
Override.afflictiondescription.warpcorrupt.t2.sel: An unknown force fills you. You feel not only new opportunities, but the literal weight of the energy that has fallen on you...
Override.afflictiondescription.warpcorrupt.t3.sel: You feel the power in your hands, and the energy that feeds you seems to be pushing you like the wind...
Override.afflictiondescription.warpcorrupt.t4.sel: You feel the heaviness again. It's as if something is pulling you back in the other world...
Override.afflictiondescription.warpcorrupt.t5.sel: You hear voices in your head that tells you how to act in a certain situation...
Override.afflictiondescription.warpcorrupt.t6.sel: You are almost pulled back by something unknown, but at the same time you feel a surge of strength...
Override.afflictiondescription.warpcorrupt.t7.sel: A certain force feeds you with its energy, but at the same time you feel some kind of mental illness...
Override.self_causeofdeathdescription.damage: You have died because of sepsis.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.sepsis: You have died because of sepsis.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.bolterexplosi: You have died of boltgun shot wounds.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeath.novaamage: Died to nova cannon shell explosion.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.novaamage: You have died to nova cannon shell explosion.
Override.afflictioncauseofdeathself.noisedamage: You have died because of too powerful sou.
Override.Entitydescription.mk7sabaton: Not those sabaton that will make you a patriot of the country where you do not even live.
Override.Entitydescription.biomaterial: Various materials and liquids. An experienced adept biologis can use this for his work in genetics. ‖color:gui.orange‖HINT‖end‖: Used in crafting ‖color:gui.green‖astartes implants‖end‖.
Override.Entitydescription.hormones: Bottle with hormones. ‖color:gui.orange‖HINT‖end‖: Used in crafting ‖color:gui.green‖astartes implants‖end‖.
Override.Entitydescription.graymatter: Brain matter. After some biologis manipulations it probably can be even used. ‖color:gui.orange‖HINT‖end‖: Used in crafting ‖color:gui.green‖astartes implants‖end‖.
Override.Jobdescription.guardsman: The Guards are well-trained soldiers equipped with simple but effective weapons.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertolasers: Your laser attacks are now [value]% stronger.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertolonglas: Your longlas attacks are now [value]% stronger.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertohellgun: Your hellgun attacks are now [value]% stronger.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertoplasma: Your plasma attacks are now [value]% stronger.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertoflamers: Your flamer attacks are now [value]% stronger.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertopistols: When you are using pistols you get [armorpenetration]% increase to armor penetration and [powerincrease]% increase to attack power.
Override.talentdescription.mechanicalecstasy: After completing any repair action you get [affliction].
Override.talentdescription.ruthlessfight.resist: When you are inside the submarine you will get [resist]% resistance to any incoming damage.
Override.talentdescription.flowres: You're [val]% more resistant to water flow.
Override.talentdescription.improvedbody: When you are submerged in water you gain [attackpoweraddition]% attack power multiplier.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertorad: Your attacks with rad weapons are [value]% stronger.
Override.talentdescription.extrapowertoarc: Your attacks with arc weapons are [value]% stronger.
Override.talentdescription.artifactharvester: When you are holding a large artifact you gain [swimmingspeed]% increase to your swimmingspeed.
Override.talentdescription.artifactcarrier: When you are holding a large artifact you gain [swimmingspeed]% increase to your swimmingspeed and [dmv]% reduction to incoming damage.
Override.talentdescription.blessing: The blessed person will get [stunres]% stun resistance, [atcspeed]% attack speed increase, [rs]% repair speed increase and [speedboost]% movement speed increase.
Override.talentdescription.ironwill: When your health is less than [state], you receive [reddamage]% less damage.
Override.talentdescription.emperorprotects: Your inspiration gives those around you a second wind, which allows them to live a little longer.
Override.talentdescription.universallaws: You can write a book. If you stay on the ground for [seconds] seconds you get [itemname], for any repaired item you also get payment in size of [moneyamount] marks.
Override.talentdescription.leader: You can inspire a second crewmate.
Override.talentdescription.medicalchiefofficer: You suprervising medical personal of the submarine. Any medic will get [va1] increased [v1], [va2] increased [v2] and [va3] increased [v3].
Override.talentdescription.darkdevotion: When your [corrupt] level reach [percentage]% enemies will ignore you.
Override.talentdescription.bloodlust: Every time when you attack a target your insanity level decreases.
Override.talentdescription.khornbless: When you are readying a melee weapon you are filled with the power of Khorn.
Override.talentdescription.tzeenchbless: You can write a book. For every killed enemy you get a book of revelations.
Override.talentdescription.slaaneshbless: You will move [speed]% faster but your health will decrease by [hp]%, as well as [resist]% resistance to drug addiction.
Override.talentdescription.reaper: When you kill a human or a human husk you can get 2 bloodpacks with [probability]% chance.
Override.talentdescription.daemonicguidance: When you are affected by [a1], you get [a2], giving you +[hb] and up to +[sgsb]% to the skill gaining speed
Override.talentdescription.khorncap: You are filled with the power of the Blood God and you feel an irresistible rage that gives you strength, but eventually leads to madness. The only way to avoid this is to kill periodically.
Override.talentdescription.slaaneshcap: The power of the God of Excess allows you to take many times more drugs before the appearance of addiction or overdose
Override.talentdescription.tzeenchcap: You can get the Book of enlightenment by completing all the selected missions
Override.talentdescription.nurglecap: You become much more resilient and get the opportunity to spread the gifts of Grandpa Nurgle
Override.talentdescription.beginerbiologis: When treating your allies, you get [exp], maximum [times] per round
Override.talentdescription.ruinscavenger: When exploring alien ruins, you can find advanced medical materials in alien containers
Override.talentdescription.darkallience: Thanks to your alliance with the forces of the warp in the presence of [a1], you get [a2], the effect of which increases your repair speed by [r%]%, as well as after the repair is completed, you get 10 units [a1]
Override.talentdescription.warpedmachines: After the repair is completed, your madness subsides slightly
Override.talentdescription.blessedbody: When you are affected by [a1], you get [a2], giving you +[dr]% damage resistance and up to +[sgsb]% to the skill gaining speed.
Override.talentdescription.machinespiritfury: When you holding mechanicus weapons in your hands you and your allies get [a1] which allows you to fight better.
Override.talentdescription.brainimplants: After killing an enemy you get [xpself] and your crew get [xpally]. You can use it up to [count] per round.
Override.talentdescription.enhancedstructure: If you have full set of ranger armor you can swim in zones with high pressure
Override.talentdescription.selfrepairprotocols: When your health goes below [hp]% self repair protocols activates and allows you survive in battle.
Override.talentdescription.martyrsoftheomnissiah: You are became immune to pain.
Override.talentdescription.protocolalpha: If you have full set of vanguard armor your allies will get [a1] in medium range from you.
Override.talentdescription.protocolbeta: If you have full set of vanguard armor your enemies will get [a1] in medium range from you.
Override.talentdescription.protocolgamma: If you have full set of vanguard armor your enemies will get [a1] in medium range from you.
Override.talentdescription.securityprotocols: Radium, arc and galvanic weapons deals [v]% more damage if you are in a friendly submarine
Override.talentdescription.innerinspiration: You gain additional [v]% health if you are in a friendly submarine
Override.talentdescription.hasteprotocols: You get increased by [v]% moving speed and melee attack speed
Override.talentdescription.secutariinoosphere: If you're using submarine turret with ally you both get [tfr]% firing rate boost and [sg]% skill gaining boost.
Override.talentdescription.advancedsecurityprotoc: Rad, arc and galvanic weapons can deal double damage if you are in a friendly submarine
Override.talentdescription.secutariialpha: You can craft double amount of rad/arc/galvanic ammunition with [probability]% chance
Override.talentdescription.effectiveplantprocessi: All processed plant with [c]% can give you [v]% more resources.
Override.talentdescription.emergencyprotocols: When submarine flooded on [f]% you will get speed boost on [v1]% and you will be able to successfully reanimate patient with higher chance.
Override.talentdescription.crafthighqualitybatter: You can craft [qualitybonus] levels higher quality batteries.
Override.talentdescription.warpenergiesheal: When you hold [i1] your allies can slowly heal.
Override.talentdescription.warpenergiesrepair: When you hold [i1] your allies can repair faster.
Override.talentdescription.warptechsorcery: When you corrupt lasgun and laspistol powercells, plasma and melta tanks with [probability]% chance you can get double result.
Override.talentdescription.munitorumlogistic: You can buy ammo for autogun, lasguns, lascarbines, longlases and hellguns for [amount]% less price.
Override.talentdescription.emperorslight: When you knocked you 50% more resistant to poisons, drowing, bleeding and blood loss, you also 95% more resistant to pain.
Override.talentdescription.fieldmedicine: Biogels, surgical kits and medkits are more effective in your hands.
Override.talentdescription.mechanicusgunner: All mechanicus ranged weapons dealing [amount]% more damage.
Override.talentname.inthenameoftheomnissiah: In the name of the Omnissiah
Override.talentdescription.inthenameoftheomnissia: When [in] in your hands you get additional [mh] [mhn], [as] [asn], [am] [amn].
Override.talentdescription.omnissiahmentorship: Your allies can craft tools and fuel tanks for them 1 quality tier better.
Override.talentdescription.discountforbrothers: All basic heretic gear can be bought by [amount]% less price.
Override.talentdescription.chosenone: When you wearing basic heretic gear you get additional [mh] [mhn], [as] [asn], [am] [amn], [rws], [rwsn], [ms], [msn].
Override.talentdescription.championshippbase: You can became champion of one of four gods
Override.talentdescription.regimentbase: You can chose Imperial guard regiment that you are assigned to.
Override.talentdescription.heavyweapons: When you hold in hands [in] you get [ms] more [msn].
Override.talentdescription.advancedmunitorumlogis: You can buy for [amount]% less price ammunition for plasma and bolt weapons, longlas and hellgun, plasmagun and bolter for mortals.
Override.entityname.ShellnecArm16degb: Living metal Shell A 16 Degrees B
Override.entityname.ShellnecArm14degb: Living metal Shell A 14 Degrees B
Override.entityname.ShellnecArm90degcurve: Living metal Shell A 90 Degrees Curve
Override.entityname.ShellnecArm45degb: Living metal Shell A 45 Degrees B
Override.entityname.ShellnecArm45degc: Living metal Shell A 45 Degrees A
Override.entityname.ShellnecArm45degd: Living metal Shell A 45 Degrees B
Override.entityname.ShellnecArm34degb: Living metal Shell A 34 Degrees B
Override.locationchange.outpost.changeto.chcity: [previousname]: In the name of the Dark gods! This colony now belongs to the chaos undivided!
Override.locationchange.chcity.changeto.chcitybig: [previousname]: In the name of the Dark gods! This colony now belongs to the chaos undivided!
Override.locationchange.outpost.changeto.choutpos: [previousname]: In the name of the Dark gods! This colony now belongs to the chaos undivided!
Override.locationchange.AmOutpost.changeto.amforg: Adeptus mechanicus are founding a new forge in [previousname].
Override.locationchange.none.changeto.choutpost: The righteous went to [previousname] and founded a new colony there.
Override.locationchange.none.changeto.amoutpost: The Adeptus Mechanicus has been sent to the [previousname] ark of the explorator and now they have a new outpost there.
Override.locationchange.choutpost.changeto.chcity: More and more believers flock to [previousname] and now it is a big temple.
Override.locationchange.locationchange.military.c: A squad of Astartes has arrived at [previousname] to improve the sector's defenses.
Override.locationchange.Amforge.changeto.amforgeb: The Adeptus Mechanicus is expanding the forge [previousname] to a large manufactorum.
Override.eventText.missionevent_crcargo.c1: I need a ship that can transport special cargo.
Override.faction.chaoscultists.description: Cultists that praise the Dark gods.
Override.terminalwelcomemsg.novacontrol: Enter coordinates from -15 to 15 to coordinate nova cannon.
Override.Entitydescription.blackcarapase: Final implant for the neophyte. Without black carapace you can't create true space marine. ‖color:gui.orange‖HINT‖end‖: Can be used only with ‖color:gui.red‖Astartes Genetic Material‖end‖
Override.entitydescription.geneticmaterialastarte: A pack of implants that can turn regular mortal into unstoppable machine of genocide. ‖color:gui.orange‖HINT‖end‖: Can be used only with ‖color:gui.red‖Black carapace‖end‖
Override.eventtext.missionevent_pirate2.c1: “A rogue vessel has been preying on our cargo shipments. Eliminate its crew, and we will show our graditude. Take care though, the ship is heavily armed.”
Override.missiondescription.pirate2: Seek out the clown vessel that has been terrorizing this area and eliminate its crew to gain a reward of [reward] marks. The marked locations show where the ship has last been sighted.
Override.missionsuccess.pirate2: The clown vessel's crew was successfully eliminated.
Override.missionfailure.pirate2: The clown vessel's crew was not eliminated.
Override.missionmessage0.pirate2: Neutralize the crew or sink the submarine to the bottom of the sea!
Override.missionmessage1.pirate2: Navigate the submarine to [location2] to claim your reward.
Override.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and there have been reports about a notorious group of outlaws having claimed it as their base. There's a bounty on the head of the group's leader's – eliminate the leader to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The leader of the Fallen has been successfully eliminated.
Override.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostassassina: Elimination of the Fallen has failed.
Override.missionheader0.abandonedoutpostassassina: Leader of the Fallen eliminated successfully.
Override.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The leader of the Fallen has been successfully eliminated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
Override.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and there have been reports about a notorious group of outlaws having claimed it as their base. There's a bounty on the head of the group's leader's – eliminate the leader to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The leader of the bandit group has been successfully eliminated.
Override.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostassassina: Elimination of the bandit group leader has failed.
Override.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The leader of the bandit group has been successfully eliminated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
Override.missiondescription.abandonedoutpostassas: Contact with [location1] was recently lost, and there have been reports about a notorious group of outlaws having claimed it as their base. There's a bounty on the head of the group's leader's – eliminate the leader to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.abandonedoutpostassassina: The leader of the bandit group has been successfully eliminated.
Override.missionfailure.abandonedoutpostassassina: Elimination of the bandit group leader has failed.
Override.missionmessage0.abandonedoutpostassassin: The leader of the bandit group has been successfully eliminated. Undock from the outpost to complete the mission.
Override.missiondescription.chlpmission: A local chaos cult in [location2] needs weapons to begin an uprising against the lap dogs of the corpse Emperor. If you are bold enough to carry those items your reward will be [reward] marks.
Override.missionsuccess.chlpmission: The weapons have been successfully delivered.
Override.missiondescription.chlgmission: A local chaos cult in [location2] needs weapons to begin an uprising against the lap dogs of the false Emperor. If you are bold enough to carry those items your reward will be [reward] marks.
Override.missionsuccess.chlgmission: The weapons have been successfully delivered.
Override.missiondescription.killcrawlerswarm1wrec: A small swarm of [monster] has been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to any crew that can neutralize it.
Override.missionmessage0.killcrawlerswarm1wreck: The swarm is terminated. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
Override.missiondescription.salvagewrecktrinket1: [location1] just received a fragmented distress call from a vessel that was thought to have been lost along with the alien artifact on it's board. Retrieve the the artifact as a priority and return it.
Override.missiondescription.salvagewrecktrinket2: [location1] just received a fragmented distress call from a vessel that was thought to have been lost along with the alien artifact on it's board. Retrieve the the artifact as a priority and return it
Override.missiondescription.salvagewrecktrinket3: [location1] just received a fragmented distress call from a vessel that was thought to have been lost along with the alien artifact on it's board. Retrieve the the artifact as a priority and return it
Override.missiondescription.killhuskmarine: Particularly aggressive husk marines have been terrorizing vessels traveling between [location1] and [location2]. A reward of [reward] marks has been promised to whoever kills the creatures.
Override.missionmessage0.killhuskmarine: Husk marines dead. Navigate the submarine out of the cavern to claim the reward.
Override.missiondescription.ceramitecollection: There's been talk of deposits of ceramite along the way from [location1] to [location2]. Bring back ten samples of ceramite to verify these claims.
Override.missionmessage0.ceramitecollection: You have mined enough ceramite. Bring it to an outpost to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.ceramitecollection: The existence of the ceramite deposits has been successfully proven.
Override.missiondescription.adamantiumcollection: There's been talk of deposits of adamantium along the way from [location1] to [location2]. Bring back ten samples of adamantium to verify these claims.
Override.missionmessage0.adamantiumcollection: You have mined enough adamantium. Bring it to an outpost to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.adamantiumcollection: The existence of the adamantium deposits has been successfully proven.
Override.missiondescription.goldcollection: There's been talk of deposits of gold along the way from [location1] to [location2]. Bring back ten samples of gold to verify these claims.
Override.missionmessage0.goldcollection: You have mined enough gold. Bring it to an outpost to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.goldcollection: The existence of the gold deposits has been successfully proven.
Override.missiondescription.aquaticpoppycollectio: There's been talk of clusters of aquatic poppy along the way from [location1] to [location2]. Bring back ten samples of aquatic poppy to verify these claims.
Override.missionmessage0.aquaticpoppycollection: You have collected enough aquatic poppy. Bring it to an outpost to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.aquaticpoppycollection: The existence of the aquatic poppy clusters has been successfully proven.
Override.missiondescription.fiberplantcollection: There's been talk of clusters of fiber plant along the way from [location1] to [location2]. Bring back ten samples of fiber plant to verify these claims.
Override.missionmessage0.fiberplantcollection: You have collected enough fiber plant. Bring it to an outpost to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.fiberplantcollection: The existence of the fiber plant clusters has been successfully proven.
Override.missiondescription.yeastshroomcollection: There's been talk of clusters of sea yeast shroom along the way from [location1] to [location2]. Bring back ten samples of sea yeast shroom to verify these claims.
Override.missionmessage0.yeastshroomcollection: You have collected enough sea yeast shroom. Bring it to an outpost to claim the reward.
Override.missionsuccess.yeastshroomcollection: The existence of the sea yeast shroom clusters has been successfully proven.
Override.uilabel.bigchargingdock: Power cell charger for stationary cannons
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.c1: You hear a strange scraping sound coming from a nearby vent. Curious, you peer through the slats of the vent cover, but it’s far too dark in there to see anything... A moment later you hear the sound again, you’re sure of it!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o1: Unscrew the vent cover to take a better look inside.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o1.c1: You manage to get the vent off easily enough and spot the source of the noise right away: The fan blade is brushing against a small metal box. Carefully retrieving it, you open it and find 1,000 marks!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o1.c2: You fumble the vent cover as you’re removing it and brush against the spinning blade. It slices into your hand before you can pull away, nicking an artery.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o2: Shine your flashlight through the vent slats and see if you can spot anything unusual.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o2.c1: You hear weird clicking sound from the vent and you see something like limb for a second... But than it's disappears.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o2.c2: Three Husks burst from the vent!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o3.c1: Seems it might have just been in your head... These outposts can get on your nerves after a while.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o3.c2: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent. Not your problem! Whatever it is, someone else will sort that out!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhusk.o3.c3: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent, but you get the nagging feeling you've not seen the end of this yet...
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.c1: You hear a strange scraping sound coming from a nearby vent. Curious, you peer through the slats of the vent cover, but it’s far too dark in there to see anything... A moment later you hear the sound again, you’re sure of it!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o1: Unscrew the vent cover to take a better look inside.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o1.c1: You manage to get the vent off easily enough and spot the source of the noise right away: The fan blade is brushing against a small metal box. Carefully retrieving it, you open it and find 1,000 marks!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o1.c2: You fumble the vent cover as you’re removing it and brush against the spinning blade. It slices into your hand before you can pull away, nicking an artery.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o2: Shine your flashlight through the vent slats and see if you can spot anything unusual.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o2.c1: An enraged mudraptor bursts from the vent!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o2.c2: Three enraged mudraptors burst from the vent!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o3.c1: Seems it might have just been in your head... These outposts can get on your nerves after a while.
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o3.c2: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent. Not your problem! Whatever it is, someone else will sort that out!
Override.eventtext.soundintheventhuskmarine.o3.c3: You decide you don’t have time for this nonsense and creep past the noisy vent, but you get the nagging feeling you've not seen the end of this yet...
